faqs.question: What Bone Tools are available?
faqs.answer:
### Generate Twist Bones
[image]https://i.imgur.com/G7oZiMO.png[/image]
- Creates twist bones for selected bones

### Bone Parenting
[image]https://i.imgur.com/lH8lNVa.png[/image]
- Groups bones under root bones
- Useful for Dynamic Bones
- Features:
  - Parent bones to new root
  - Refresh bone list
  - Automatic grouping
